con:testCase.name: TestCase-DEV-chargeCustomer-All-Brands-All-MSISDNsLength
con:testCase.con:description: Tests charging options with msisdn length = 6, 8 and 9 and save results in report

con:configuration.query: Select Conf.Tenant_ID, Conf.Brand_ID, Conf.Name From SERVICEPROVIDER_CONF Conf where Tenant_ID>0 AND Brand_ID>0 AND Active=1 Order By Conf.TENANT_ID, Conf.BRAND_ID

con:request.name: chargeCustomer-OnDemand
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: chargeCustomer-OnDemandSMS
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND_SMS</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:-->
</cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: chargeCustomer-Monthly
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>MONTHLY</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:-->
</cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: chargeCustomer-Pack
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>PACKPAYMENT</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> <pack> <packName>packName-${#Project#DateTime_Current_String_yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS}</packName> <packId>${#Project#GUID}</packId> </pack> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: OCS-walletThresholdEventExtNot-Threshold
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.your.gov/certo/dare</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> <v1:userCode>${#TestSuite#DRC-OCS-extNotify-userCode}</v1:userCode> <v1:result> <!--type: string--> <v1:opReference>${#Project#GUID}</v1:opReference> <v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:subscriberId> <v1:e164Number>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</v1:e164Number> </v1:subscriberId> <!--type: string--> <v1:tariffPlan>3P</v1:tariffPlan> <v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:subscriberState>A</v1:subscriberState> <v1:subscriberSubState>A</v1:subscriberSubState> </v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:technologyCode>0100</v1:technologyCode> <v1:serviceProviderId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-OCS-ID}</v1:serviceProviderId> </v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:monetaryInfo> <!--type: CurrencyCodeType--> <v1:currencyCode>${#Project#Currency_Default}</v1:currencyCode> <v1:opCost exponent="-2">100</v1:opCost> <v1:balance exponent="-2">500</v1:balance> </v1:monetaryInfo> <v1:operationInfo> <!--type: string--> <v1:operationCode>Test</v1:operationCode> <!--type: int--> <v1:subOperationCode>9999</v1:subOperationCode> </v1:operationInfo> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:flagOperationOrCancellation>false</v1:flagOperationOrCancellation> </v1:result> <v1:walletThresholdEvent> <v1:walletThreshold> <!--type: string--> <v1:walletId>2</v1:walletId> <v1:threshold exponent="-2">${#TestSuite#Threshold.thresholdAmount-Min}</v1:threshold> </v1:walletThreshold> </v1:walletThresholdEvent> </v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
